data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade Maurice Dufrasne have now been confirmed.
The first-half is in progress. Liege get the game underway.
In the minute 35, Goal! A Merveille Bokadi header gives Liege a 1-0 lead in Liege.
Goal! Smail Prevljak equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Eden Shamir (Liege) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Eupen with the kick-off.
In the minute 57, Eupen take a 1-2 lead thanks to Stef Peeters.
Philippe Montanier is making the team's first substitution at Stade Maurice Dufrasne with Abdoul Tapsoba replacing Maxime Lestienne.
The away team replace Julien Ngoy with Amara Baby.
In the minute 81, The home team have replaced Obbi Oulare with Felipe Avenatti. This is the second substitution made today by Philippe Montanier.
Benat San Jose Gil (Eupen) is making a second substitution, with Knowledge Musona replacing Adriano.
Menno Koch is on a sub for Konan N'Dri for Eupen.
That's full-time at Stade Maurice Dufrasne. The final score is 2-2.
Goal! Liege go level at 2-2 through Arnaud Bodart in Liege.
